001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.optimizer.steps;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.Pair;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.TypedVector;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.Vector;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.Vectors;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.model.HyperparameterConfigurable;
009import net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.LinearCombination;
010import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.optimizer.LearningRateConfigurable;
011import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.optimizer.UpdateStep;
012import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regularization.ExplicitRegularization;
013import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regularization.Regularizations;
014
015import java.util.Map;
016import java.util.Set;
017import java.util.WeakHashMap;
018
019public class Adam<N extends Number> implements UpdateStep<LinearCombination<N>, N>, LearningRateConfigurable<N>, HyperparameterConfigurable {
020
021    public static final String HP_BETA_1 = "beta1";
022    public static final String HP_BETA_2 = "beta2";
023
024    private final Map<LinearCombination<N>, Pair<TypedVector<N>, TypedVector<N>>> adaptions = new WeakHashMap<>();
025
026    private N learningRate;
027    private N beta1;
028    private N beta2;
029
030    public Adam(N learningRate, N beta1, N beta2) {
031        this.learningRate = learningRate;
032        this.beta1 = beta1;
033        this.beta2 = beta2;
034    }
035
036    @Override
037    public Vector<N> calculateUpdate(Vector<N> gradients, LinearCombination<N> model, int step, Set<ExplicitRegularization<N>> regularizations) {
038        JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport = model.getCurrentNumberType();
039
040        Pair<TypedVector<N>, TypedVector<N>> adaptions = this.adaptions.computeIfAbsent(model, k -> Pair.mutable(null, null));
041        TypedVector<N> m = adaptions.left();
042        TypedVector<N> v = adaptions.right();
043
044        N[] parameters = model.getParameters();
045        Vector<N> thetas = Vectors.of(model.getCurrentNumberType(), parameters).transpose();
046        TypedVector<N> regularizationGradients = (TypedVector<N>) Regularizations.applyExplicitRegularization(regularizations, thetas, gradients);
047
048        // m = β1 * m + (1 - β1) * g
049        TypedVector<N> secondTermM = regularizationGradients.multiply(typeSupport.subtract(typeSupport.one(), beta1));
050        m = m == null ? secondTermM : m.multiply(beta1).add(secondTermM);
051
052        // v = β2 * v + (1 - β2) * g^2
053        TypedVector<N> gradientSquared = Vectors.squared(regularizationGradients);
054        TypedVector<N> secondTermV = gradientSquared.multiply(typeSupport.subtract(typeSupport.one(), beta2));
055        v = v == null ? secondTermV : v.multiply(beta2).add(secondTermV);
056
057        // Store the results
058        adaptions.setLeft(m);
059        adaptions.setRight(v);
060
061        // Bias correction
062        N beta1T = typeSupport.pow(this.beta1, step);
063        N beta2T = typeSupport.pow(this.beta2, step);
064        N oneMinusBeta1T = typeSupport.subtract(typeSupport.one(), beta1T);
065        N oneMinusBeta2T = typeSupport.subtract(typeSupport.one(), beta2T);
066
067        TypedVector<N> mHat = m.multiply(typeSupport.inverse(oneMinusBeta1T));
068        TypedVector<N> vHat = v.multiply(typeSupport.inverse(oneMinusBeta2T));
069
070        // θ = θ - α * m̂ / (sqrt(v̂) + ε)
071        TypedVector<N> vHatSqrt = Vectors.squareRoot(vHat); // element wise sqrt
072        TypedVector<N> denom = vHatSqrt.add(typeSupport.epsilon()); // epsilon is scalar, broadcasts
073
074        return Vectors.divide(mHat, denom).multiply(model.getCurrentNumberType().negate(learningRate));
075    }
076
077    @Override
078    public Map<String, Object> getHyperparameters() {
079        return Map.of(
080                HP_LEARNING_RATE, learningRate,
081                HP_BETA_1, beta1,
082                HP_BETA_2, beta2);
083    }
084
085    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
086    @Override
087    public void setHyperparameter(String name, Object value) {
088        if (HP_LEARNING_RATE.equals(name)) {
089            this.learningRate = (N) value;
090        }
091        if (HP_BETA_1.equals(name)) {
092            this.beta1 = (N) value;
093        }
094        if (HP_BETA_2.equals(name)) {
095            this.beta2 = (N) value;
096        }
097    }
098
099    public N getBeta1() {
100        return beta1;
101    }
102
103    public void setBeta1(N beta1) {
104        this.beta1 = beta1;
105    }
106
107    public N getBeta2() {
108        return beta2;
109    }
110
111    public void setBeta2(N beta2) {
112        this.beta2 = beta2;
113    }
114}
